page.title: 04Playground Games
page.content: French skipping is played by many girls at Painters Ash C.P. School.In this game 2 girls stand facing each other with a loop of elastic around their ankles.A third girl does a series of jumps in and out of the loop.With her last jump she lands on the elastic and shouts "on".She does this 4 times and chants "England, Scotland,Ireland,Wales".The elastic is then moved higher up the girls' legs and so on until the third girl makes a mistake.Other children at the school play Pom-Pom. The child who is "it" closes their eyes and counts to 150 at the Pom-Pom post while the others hide.That child then goes to look for the others.They have to return to the Pom-Pom post without being seen and say"pom myself 1,2,3".But if the child who is"it"gets there first he says "pom(your name)1,2,3"and you are out.
